p: Likewise, cardamonin, another flavonoid from A. galanga, decreased the cardiotoxicity of doxorubicin (DOX) via inhibition of both inflammation and oxidative stress through the Nrf2 pathway. Nrf2 has a close cross-talk with NF-κB and thus, the antioxidant and anti-inflammatory effect of galangal via these pathways is further confirmed ( Qi et al., 2020).
